doc.title: Black Summer
doc.plot: A coming of age film with the intertwined tales of two teenagers. Peter, is in the middle of his high school career and is dealing with a friend who's father has just passed away. His friend is heading off to summer camp leaving Peter to be in the company of another friend Steve. Steve is the typical class clown that lives more on the edge than Peter. Steve often gets Peter into bad situations. Michael is the narrarator of the film who at the films intro is shown sitting in his car, in an abandoned parking lot, and the victim of a self inflicted gun shot wound to the head. He narrarates his story and Peter's story during his last day alive.
